# GitHub Pull Request Template

## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and why they were made.

## Type of Change

- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Infrastructure change
- [ ] Security fix

## Related Issue

Closes #(issue number)

## Testing

Please describe the testing done:

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests passed
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] No tests needed (documentation only)

## Deployment Considerations

- [ ] Requires CloudFormation update
- [ ] Requires MWAA DAG update
- [ ] Breaking changes
- [ ] Database migration needed
- [ ] No deployment impact

## Security Checklist

- [ ] No hardcoded credentials
- [ ] No sensitive data in logs
- [ ] IAM permissions reviewed
- [ ] Encryption enabled where applicable
- [ ] VPC/security group rules reviewed

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] No new warnings generated
- [ ] Changes reviewed locally

## Screenshots (if applicable)

Add screenshots for UI/output changes

## Additional Notes

Add any additional notes or context here
